pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū saṃghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā eko heṭṭhā viharati, eko upari.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.3: Uparimo bhikkhu āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.4: Mañcapādo nippatitvā heṭṭhimassa bhikkhuno matthake avatthāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.8: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.9: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.10: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu saṃghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.11: Atha kho te bhikkhū taṃ bhikkhuṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.12: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, saṃghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.15: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, saṃghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.17: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:1.18: “Yo pana bhikkhu saṃghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:2.2.1: Saṃghike saṃghikasaññī uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:2.2.3: saṃghike puggalikasaññī uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:2.2.6: Puggalike puggalikasaññī aññassa puggalike, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc18:2.3.7: tasmiṃ ṭhito gaṇhati vā laggeti vā,
